Uses of Class
com.azure.core.credentials.TokenRequest

  • Packages that use TokenRequest 
    Package Description
    com.azure.core.credentials
    Package containing basic credential classes for authentication purposes.
    com.azure.identity.credential
    Package containing various types of credentials
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs
    Package containing classes for creating an EventHubClient or an EventHubAsyncClient to perform operations on Azure Event Hubs.

    • Uses of TokenRequest in com.azure.core.credentials

      Methods in com.azure.core.credentials that return TokenRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenRequest TokenRequest.addScopes(String... scopes)
      Adds one or more scopes to the request scopes.
      TokenRequest TokenRequest.setScopes(List<String> scopes)
      Sets the scopes required for the token.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<AccessToken> BasicAuthenticationCredential.getToken(TokenRequest request) 
      Mono<AccessToken> TokenCredential.getToken(TokenRequest request)
      Asynchronously get a token for a given resource/audience.

    • Uses of TokenRequest in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs

      Methods in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs with parameters of type TokenRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<AccessToken> EventHubSharedAccessKeyCredential.getToken(TokenRequest request)
      Retrieves the token, given the audience/resources requested, for use in authorization against an Event Hubs namespace or a specific Event Hub instance.
